## ... as applicants / for your CV

1. Go to the [RESQUE Collector](https://nicebread.github.io/RESQUE/web/) app, and enter the data for up to 10 research contributions (publications, data set, or research software). Typically, this takes between 6 and 12 minutes per contribution.
2. When done, save the data as a local `json` file.
3. Go to the [RESQUE Profiler](http://shiny.psy.lmu.de/felix/RESQUE_profile/) app, upload your `json` file, and get your Research Profile.
